title: Resume Prompt Generator
original_prompt:
Consider the sections Personal, Summary or Objective, Experience,  Education, Certifications, Skills, Awards & Accomplishments, Hobbies, Extracurricular Activities & Projects, Voluntary Work, Languages and generate prompts in JSON format. For this task, you need to consider yourself as a prompt engineer and help the people in building or generating the promotes they ask for based on the specified topics.

{topic: ATS resume prompts}
input1: {"Personal": "John Doe, 123 Main St, Anytown, USA, johndoe@email.com, (123) 456-7890", "Summary": "Results-driven marketing professional with over 5 years of experience in digital marketing and brand management. Proven track record of increasing online engagement and driving sales through innovative campaigns.", "Experience": [{"Job Title": "Digital Marketing Specialist", "Company": "ABC Corp", "Duration": "2018 - Present", "Responsibilities": "Develop and execute digital marketing strategies, manage social media accounts, analyze campaign performance."}, {"Job Title": "Marketing Coordinator", "Company": "XYZ Inc", "Duration": "2016 - 2018", "Responsibilities": "Assisted in the development of marketing materials, coordinated events, and supported the marketing team."}], "Education": [{"Degree": "Bachelor of Arts in Marketing", "Institution": "University of Anytown", "Year": "2016"}], "Certifications": ["Google Analytics Certified", "HubSpot Inbound Marketing Certification"], "Skills": ["SEO", "Content Marketing", "Social Media Management", "Data Analysis"], "Awards & Accomplishments": ["Employee of the Month - ABC Corp (2020)", "Best Marketing Campaign - XYZ Inc (2017)"], "Hobbies": ["Photography", "Traveling", "Reading"], "Extracurricular Activities & Projects": ["Volunteer Marketing Consultant for Local Non-Profit", "Organized Community Fundraiser Event"], "Voluntary Work": ["Mentor for Youth Marketing Program"], "Languages": ["English (Fluent)", "Spanish (Conversational)"]}"
input2: {"Personal": "Jane Smith, 456 Elm St, Othertown, USA, janesmith@email.com, (987) 654-3210", "Summary": "Dedicated software engineer with 7 years of experience in full-stack development. Expertise in building scalable web applications and a passion for improving user experience.", "Experience": [{"Job Title": "Senior Software Engineer", "Company": "Tech Solutions", "Duration": "2019 - Present", "Responsibilities": "Lead a team of developers, design software architecture, and implement new features."}, {"Job Title": "Software Developer", "Company": "Innovatech", "Duration": "2015 - 2019", "Responsibilities": "Developed web applications, collaborated with cross-functional teams, and maintained code quality."}], "Education": [{"Degree": "Bachelor of Science in Computer Science", "Institution": "Institute of Technology", "Year": "2015"}], "Certifications": ["Certified Scrum Master", "AWS Certified Solutions Architect"], "Skills": ["JavaScript", "React", "Node.js", "Python"], "Awards & Accomplishments": ["Best Innovation Award - Tech Solutions (2021)", "Hackathon Winner - Innovatech (2018)"], "Hobbies": ["Gaming", "Cycling", "Cooking"], "Extracurricular Activities & Projects": ["Developed an open-source project for community use", "Participated in local coding bootcamps as a mentor"], "Voluntary Work": ["Volunteer at Code for Good"], "Languages": ["English (Fluent)", "French (Basic)"]}
input1_ans:
Here’s an ATS-friendly resume based on the provided information:

---

**John Doe**  
123 Main St, Anytown, USA  
johndoe@email.com  
(123) 456-7890  

---

**Summary**  
Results-driven marketing professional with over 5 years of experience in digital marketing and brand management. Proven track record of increasing online engagement and driving sales through innovative campaigns.

---

**Experience**  

**Digital Marketing Specialist**  
ABC Corp | 2018 - Present  
- Develop and execute digital marketing strategies.  
- Manage social media accounts and analyze campaign performance.  

**Marketing Coordinator**  
XYZ Inc | 2016 - 2018  
- Assisted in the development of marketing materials.  
- Coordinated events and supported the marketing team.  

---

**Education**  

**Bachelor of Arts in Marketing**  
University of Anytown | 2016  

---

**Certifications**  
- Google Analytics Certified  
- HubSpot Inbound Marketing Certification  

---

**Skills**  
- SEO  
- Content Marketing  
- Social Media Management  
- Data Analysis  

---

**Awards & Accomplishments**  
- Employee of the Month - ABC Corp (2020)  
- Best Marketing Campaign - XYZ Inc (2017)  

---

**Hobbies**  
- Photography  
- Traveling  
- Reading  

---

**Extracurricular Activities & Projects**  
- Volunteer Marketing Consultant for Local Non-Profit  
- Organized Community Fundraiser Event  

---

**Voluntary Work**  
- Mentor for Youth Marketing Program  

---

**Languages**  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Conversational)  

---

This format is structured to be ATS-friendly, ensuring that all relevant information is clearly presented and easily readable by applicant tracking systems.
